column4: I am trying to install my first Ubuntu server but I cant seem to get the GUI interface to start
All I get is the terminal prompt.
I can log in but that is about it.
has anyone successfully installed Ubuntu 9.4 server?
yes racecar that is what I am attempting to install
I need to test it to make sure that it will do what we need it to do.
but the GUI interface wont load.
Server doesn't install the desktop by default.  Did you add that yourself?  Also, what's the point of that in the first place?
nope, at least not by default.
Why load server if you want a desktop?
Why waste cpu cycles and RAM to support a full UI when the purpose of a server is to serve up data?
It sounds to me like you want a desktop with some server capabilities.  In that case, simply install the desktop edition and then bring in the server apps you want to play with.
